mapper.insert: INSERT INTO db_task_config (task_name, db_source, db_source_table, db_target_source, db_target_source_table, db_import_before_data, db_import_after_data, db_overwrite, db_field_mapper, task_create_time) VALUES (#{taskName}, #{source}, #{sourceTable}, #{targetSource}, #{targetSourceTable}, #{importBeforeData}, #{importAfterData}, #{overwrite}, #{fieldMapper}, now())
